main_definition: To start to look or grow into the type of person, thing, or situation described by a description.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Starting to develop a certain characteristic or quality
meanings_and_examples.example: She is becoming more confident in her abilities.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Progressing towards an expected role, state, or condition
meanings_and_examples.example: He is becoming the team leader as he has proven his skills and dedication.
The artist's new album is becoming increasingly successful worldwide.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Beginning to take on a particular appearance, style, or characteristic
meanings_and_examples.example: The young girl was becoming more and more like her mother each day.
His business is undergoing many changes as it adapts to new market demands.
